vm.name: brg1
vm.exec:
service openvswitch-switch start sleep 5 ovs-vsctl add-br br0 ovs-vsctl add-port br0 eth1 ovs-vsctl add-port br0 vxlan1 -- set interface vxlan1 type=vxlan options:remote_ip=10.255.0.1
# Definir versiones OpenFlow echo "Definiendo version OpenFlow 1.0, 1.1, 1.2, 1.3 ..." ovs-vsctl set Bridge brint protocols=OpenFlow10,OpenFlow11,OpenFlow12,OpenFlow13
# Definir el puerto del manager y controlador de OpenFlow: ovs-vsctl set bridge br0 other-config:datapath-id=0000000000000002 ovs-vsctl set-manager ptcp:6632 ovs-vsctl set-controller br0 tcp:10.255.0.1:6633
# KNF access -> brgX : 12 Mbps bajada # brgX -> KNF access : 6 Mbps subida # Definir la ruta del manager curl -X PUT -d '"tcp:10.255.0.1:6632"' http://localhost:8080/v1.0/conf/switches/0000000000000002/ovsdb_addr sleep 2
# Crear una cola con QoS # 6 Mbps como máximo para el enlace # Cola 0 - hx1 : máx 2 Mbps # Cola 1 - hx2 : mín 4 Mbps curl -X POST -d '{"port_name": "vxlan1", "type": "linux-htb", "max_rate": "6000000", "queues": [{"max_rate": "2000000"}, {"min_rate": "4000000"}]}' http://localhost:8080/qos/queue/0000000000000002
# Definir a que cola pertenece cada tráfico curl -X POST -d '{"match": {"dl_src": "02:fd:00:04:01:01", "dl_type": "IPv4"}, "actions":{"queue": "0"}}' http://localhost:8080/qos/rules/0000000000000002 curl -X POST -d '{"match": {"dl_src": "02:fd:00:04:00:01", "dl_type": "IPv4"}, "actions":{"queue": "1"}}' http://localhost:8080/qos/rules/0000000000000002
